Users Views#

This section provides documentation for views related to user management within the eLearning app.

class eLearning.views.users.AutocompleteView(**kwargs)#

Bases: View

View for handling autocomplete functionality.

This view fetches users based on the search query entered by the user and returns the matching results in HTML format for use in autocomplete suggestions.

Parameters:

  • request (HttpRequest) – The HTTP request object.

  • args (tuple) – Additional positional arguments.

  • kwargs (dict) – Additional keyword arguments.

Returns:

An HTTP response with HTML containing autocomplete options.

Return type:

HttpResponse

get(request, *args, **kwargs)#

Handles GET requests to fetch autocomplete options.

This method retrieves users based on the search query entered by the user and returns the matching results in HTML format for use in autocomplete suggestions.

Parameters:

  • request (HttpRequest) – The HTTP request object.

  • args (tuple) – Additional positional arguments.

  • kwargs (dict) – Additional keyword arguments.

Returns:

An HTTP response with HTML containing autocomplete options.

Return type:

HttpResponse

class eLearning.views.users.DashboardView(**kwargs)#

Bases: View

View for rendering the dashboard page.

This view handles requests to render the dashboard page for both students and teachers. The dashboard displays registered courses, status updates, course chats, and deadlines for the user.

Attributes:

template_student (str): The template file path for the student dashboard. template_teacher (str): The template file path for the teacher dashboard.

dispatch(request, *args, **kwargs)#

Dispatch method to handle request dispatching.

Parameters:

  • request (HttpRequest) – The HTTP request object.

  • args – Additional positional arguments.

  • kwargs – Additional keyword arguments.

Returns:

The HTTP response object.

Return type:

HttpResponse

get(request, *args, **kwargs)#

Handle GET requests to render the dashboard page.

This method retrieves necessary data based on the user type (student or teacher), and renders the corresponding dashboard template with the context.

Parameters:

  • request (HttpRequest) – The HTTP request object.

  • args – Additional positional arguments.

  • kwargs – Additional keyword arguments.

Returns:

The rendered dashboard page.

Return type:

HttpResponse

template_student = 'user/student_dashboard.html'#
template_teacher = 'user/teacher_dashboard.html'#
class eLearning.views.users.LandingView(**kwargs)#

Bases: TemplateView

Renders the landing page template for unauthenticated users.

If the user is authenticated, redirects to the dashboard page.

dispatch(request, *args, **kwargs)#

Dispatches the request, redirecting authenticated users to the dashboard.

Parameters:

  • request (HttpRequest) – The HTTP request object.

  • args (tuple) – Variable length argument list.

  • kwargs (dict) – Arbitrary keyword arguments.

Returns:

Redirects authenticated users to the dashboard, otherwise renders the landing page template.

Return type:

HttpResponseRedirect

template_name = 'public/landing.html'#
class eLearning.views.users.ProfileView(**kwargs)#

Bases: View

View for handling user profile.

This view allows users to view and update their profile information, including the profile picture.

Parameters:

  • request (HttpRequest) – The HTTP request object.

  • args (tuple) – Additional positional arguments.

  • kwargs (dict) – Additional keyword arguments.

Returns:

An HTTP response with the user profile information or a success/error message.

Return type:

HttpResponse

get(request, *args, **kwargs)#

Handles GET requests to retrieve user profile information.

This method retrieves the user’s profile information and renders the profile page with the profile form.

Parameters:

  • request (HttpRequest) – The HTTP request object.

  • args (tuple) – Additional positional arguments.

  • kwargs (dict) – Additional keyword arguments.

Returns:

An HTTP response with the rendered profile page.

Return type:

HttpResponse

put(request, *args, **kwargs)#

Handles PUT requests to update user profile information.

This method updates the user’s profile information based on the data received in the request body.

Parameters:

  • request (HttpRequest) – The HTTP request object.

  • args (tuple) – Additional positional arguments.

  • kwargs (dict) – Additional keyword arguments.

Returns:

An HTTP response with a success or error message.

Return type:

HttpResponse

class eLearning.views.users.SearchUsersView(**kwargs)#

Bases: UserPassesTestMixin, ListView

View for searching users based on a query.

This view allows searching for users based on a query string entered by the user. The search results are displayed in a paginated list.

Parameters:

  • request (HttpRequest) – The HTTP request object.

  • args (tuple) – Additional positional arguments.

  • kwargs (dict) – Additional keyword arguments.

Returns:

An HTTP response containing search results.

Return type:

HttpResponse

context_object_name = 'users'#
get_context_data(**kwargs)#

Adds additional context data to the view.

This method adds the search query to the context data dictionary, which will be passed to the template for rendering.

Parameters:

kwargs (dict) – Additional keyword arguments.

Returns:

The context data dictionary.

Return type:

dict

get_queryset()#

Retrieves the queryset of users based on the search query.

This method fetches users from the database based on the search query entered by the user in the request. The queryset is filtered based on the user type and the search query.

Returns:

A queryset containing the users matching the search query.

Return type:

QuerySet

paginate_by = 10#
template_name = 'user/search_users.html'#
test_func()#

Checks if the current user is authorized to access the view.

This method verifies whether the current user is either a student or a teacher, as only students and teachers are allowed to access this view.

Returns:

True if the user is authorized, False otherwise.

Return type:

bool

class eLearning.views.users.UploadPictureView(**kwargs)#

Bases: FormView

View for uploading a profile picture.

This view allows users to upload a profile picture by providing a form to select an image file. Upon successful upload, the profile picture is associated with the current user.

Parameters:

form_class (Form) – The form class used for uploading the profile picture.

form_class#

alias of ProfilePictureForm

form_valid(form)#

Handles form submission when the form data is valid.

This method is called when the form data submitted by the user is valid. It saves the uploaded file to the user’s profile picture field.

Parameters:

form (Form) – The form instance containing the uploaded picture.

Returns:

A response indicating successful form submission.

Return type:

HttpResponse

get_success_url()#

Retrieves the URL to redirect to after successful form submission.

This method returns the URL to redirect to after successfully uploading the profile picture.

Returns:

The URL to redirect to.

Return type:

str

class eLearning.views.users.UserHomePage(**kwargs)#

Bases: View

View for rendering the user’s home page.

This view renders the home page for a specific user, displaying different content based on whether the user is a student or a teacher.

Parameters:

  • request (HttpRequest) – The HTTP request object.

  • args (tuple) – Additional positional arguments.

  • kwargs (dict) – Additional keyword arguments.

Returns:

An HTTP response with the rendered home page.

Return type:

HttpResponse

dispatch(request, *args, **kwargs)#

Dispatch method for handling the request.

This method dispatches the request to the appropriate handler based on the user’s authentication status.

Parameters:

  • request (HttpRequest) – The HTTP request object.

  • args (tuple) – Additional positional arguments.

  • kwargs (dict) – Additional keyword arguments.

Returns:

An HTTP response returned by the dispatched handler.

Return type:

HttpResponse

get(request, *args, **kwargs)#

Handler for processing GET requests.

This method handles GET requests to the user’s home page, retrieving necessary data based on the user’s role and rendering the appropriate template.

Parameters:

  • request (HttpRequest) – The HTTP request object.

  • args (tuple) – Additional positional arguments.

  • kwargs (dict) – Additional keyword arguments.

Returns:

An HTTP response with the rendered home page.

Return type:

HttpResponse

eLearning.views.users.userSearchFilter(user_id, user_type, query)#

Function to filter users based on the search query and user type.

This function filters users based on the provided search query and user type.

Parameters:

  • user_id (int) – The ID of the user performing the search.

  • user_type (str) – The type of the user performing the search (student or teacher).

  • query (str) – The search query entered by the user.

Returns:

The filtered queryset of users.

Return type:

QuerySet
